member.summary: Results from search of Google web service

member.summary: Delegate for notifying interested parties of Google search results

member.name: T:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchService
member.summary: Generated Soap proxy client for calling Google web service

member.name: M:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchService.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for Google Soap proxy
member.param: Url to Google Web service
Url to proxy server if code is behind firewall

member.name: M:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchService.doGoogleSearch(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method for doing Google web service query
member.param: Provided by Google, this is required for you to access the Google service. Google uses the key for authentication and logging.
Query terms.
Zero-based index of the first desired result.

Number of results desired per query. The maximum value per query is 10. Note: If you do a query that doesn't have many matches, the actual number of results you get may be smaller than what you request.

Activates or deactivates automatic results filtering, which hides very similar results and results that all come from the same Web host. Filtering tends to improve the end user experience on Google, but for your application you may prefer to turn it off.
Restricts the search to a subset of the Google Web index, such as a country like "Ukraine" or a topic like "Linux."
A Boolean value which enables filtering of adult content in the search results.
Language Restrict - Restricts the search to documents within one or more languages.
Input Encoding - this parameter has been deprecated and is ignored. All requests to the APIs should be made with UTF-8 encoding.
Output Encoding - this parameter has been deprecated and is ignored. All requests to the APIs should be made with UTF-8 encoding.

member.name: T:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult
member.summary: Result from querying Google web service

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.documentFiltering
member.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether filtering was performed on the search results. This will be "true" only if (a) you requested filtering and (b) filtering actually occurred.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.searchComments
member.summary: A text string intended for display to an end user. One of the most common messages found here is a note that "stop words" were removed from the search automatically. (This happens for very common words such as "and" and "as.")

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.estimatedTotalResultsCount
member.summary: The estimated total number of results that exist for the query. Note: The estimated number may be either higher or lower than the actual number of results that exist.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.estimateIsExact
member.summary: A Boolean value indicating that the estimate is actually the exact value.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.resultElements
member.summary: An array of resultElement items. This corresponds to the actual list of search results

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.searchQuery
member.summary: This is the value of the search request.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.startIndex
member.summary: Indicates the index (1-based) of the first search result in resultElements.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.endIndex
member.summary: Indicates the index (1-based) of the last search result in resultElements.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.searchTips
member.summary: A text string intended for display to the end user. It provides instructive suggestions on how to use Google.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.directoryCategories
member.summary: An array of directoryCategory items. This corresponds to the ODP directory matches for this search.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.GoogleSearchResult.searchTime
member.summary: Text, floating-point number indicating the total server time to return the search results, measured in seconds.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.summary
member.summary: If the search result has a listing in the ODP directory, the ODP summary appears here as a text string.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.URL
member.summary: The URL of the search result, returned as text, with an absolute URL path.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.snippet
member.summary: A snippet which shows the query in context on the URL where it appears. This is formatted HTML and usually includes bold tags within it. Note that the query term does not always appear in the snippet. Note: Query terms will be in highlighted in bold in the results, and line breaks will be included for proper text wrapping.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.title
member.summary: The title of the search result, returned as HTML.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.cachedSize
member.summary: Text (Integer + "k"). Indicates that a cached version of the Url is available; size is indicated in kilobytes.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.relatedInformationPresent
member.summary: Boolean indicating that the "related:" query term is supported for this URL.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.hostName
member.summary: When filtering occurs, a maximum of two results from any given host is returned. When this occurs, the second resultElement that comes from that host contains the host name in this parameter.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.directoryCategory
member.summary: See directoryTitle.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.ResultElement.directoryTitle
member.summary: If the URL for this resultElement is contained in the ODP directory, the title that appears in the directory appears here as a text string. Note that the directoryTitle may be different from the URL's title.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.DirectoryCategory.fullViewableName
member.summary: Text, containing the ODP directory name for the current ODP category.

member.name: F:Apress.GoogleControls.Service.DirectoryCategory.specialEncoding
member.summary: Specifies the encoding scheme of the directory information.
